pages.text: To summon a spirit the magician needs to know their $(thing)True Name$(). Nowadays one most commonly refers to works such as this, but in ancient times active research was common. Some spirits can be convinced to share their knowledge of true names of other demons, either by promising a swift return to The Other Place, or by more persuasive measures such as torture.

In this work you will find the known names of spirits of all 4 ranks, as well as some beyond that. To summon a spirit, copy their name from this book into the appropriate book of binding, then use this bound book of binding to activate a ritual.
